General.Name: Vakif Finansal Kiralama AS
General.Description: Vakif Finansal Kiralama A.S. provides financial leasing services in Turkey. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Vakif Finansal Kiralama A.S. is a subsidiary of Türkiye Vakiflar Bankasi Türk Anonim Ortakligi. Vakif Finansal Kiralama A.S. (IBSE:VAKFN) operates as a subsidiary of Türkiye Vakiflar Bankasi Türk Anonim Ortakligi
General.Address: BUeyUekdere Av. Matbuat Street, Istanbul, Turkey, 34394
